name: Britpave Barrier Systems Ltd
goal: The licensing and promotion of road restraint systems which have been tested to European Standard EN 1317.  BBS holds the intellectual property, designs and crash test results which are licensed across the EU to contractors enabling them to construct compliant road restraint systems.  These systems can then be CE marked in accordance with the CPR.
interests: Budget, Competition, Enterprise, Internal Market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
All road restraint systems are tested to EN 1317. All BBS systems comply with this Standard.
Under CPR all road restraint systems must be CE marked as there is a European Standard governing their use.
